guide.title: You can see the status of invitations for people you've invited to the group. If you cancel an invitation They won't be able to join the group.

cancelInvite.title: Are you sure you want to cancel the invitation?
cancelInvite.subtitle: If you cancel an invitation, the member will not be able to join the group through the invitation email sent to them.

leaveGroup.title: Do you want to leave the group?
leaveGroup.subtitle: If you leave a group, you'll no longer have access to the group calendar or group bookings page, and you won't receive notifications for bookings made to that group.

editModal.title: Update My Profile
editModal.subtitle: Please enter your personal information to be shared among group members.
editModal.name: Name
editModal.memoSubtitle: Please provide any additional memo you would like to share with the group
